title: DI Library: Vaccine Information: COVID-19 Vaccines
author: Lisa Schattman
description: A guide from the DI Library to the facts and the current state of the medical and scientific research Get the facts about COVID-19 vaccines from sources recommended by the DI Library
cleaned_text: | | Lisa Schattman (she/her/hers) | | to a small number of trusted sources. When you read, hear and see stories and soundbites, check your trusted sources to make sure that information is accurate BEFORE you believe it or share it.
